(In reply to comment #1) > Guide updated and improved for 7.0 based on your patch, with some > modifications. Updated guide will hit the website soon. > > Thanks for the contribution. I'd have created the .launch files if you wanted. Looking at the svn commit I think there is still an error though. > +
If you want to configure these yourself (or are using a different IDE) > +then use org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina as the main class, > +start/stop as program arguments, and specify > -Dcatalina.home=... > +(with the name of your build directory) as VM arguments. AFAIK org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina no longer has a main method. I think this should be org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap as it is in the two launch files.
